ResourceHeader.ResourceName: SNOE Orbital Averages of Nitric Oxide (NO) Density in Geomagnetic Bins
ResourceHeader.Description: This level 3 data set from the Student Nitric Oxide Explorer (SNOE) ultraviolet spectrometer (UVS) contains orbital averages of nitric oxide (NO) density for the altitudes range 96.6 to 150 km as deduced from the UVS count rates ([0, 1] gamma band; 237 nm). Averaging was done in geomagnetic coordinates in a 38x20 array, using bins of 5 degree geomagnetic latitude, 3.3 km altitude, and 24 degrees in longitude.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator, Dr. Charles A. Barth, and SPDF.
